tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following techniques would one use to separate proteins based on size?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Polymerase chain reaction
X) E. coli transduction
Y) SDS-polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis [el-ek-troh-fer-ee-sihs]
Z) Enzyme-linked immunoprecipitation
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following is true regarding the phylum Cnidaria [nihd-air-ee-uh]?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Cnidarians include organisms such as flatworms and tapeworms
X) Cnidarians usually have a motile medusa form and a non-motile polyp form
Y) Cnidarians form three germ layers during development, one of which forms the coelem
Z) Gastropoda is a class within the phylum Cnidaria
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) CNIDARIANS USUALLY HAVE A MOTILE MEDUSA FORM AND A NON-MOTILE POLYP FORM
